attributes.action: Force All airline makers to install the latest Sat finding systems in Planes.
attributes.additional_details:
Due to the fact that in this day and age a Plane can vanish without anyone knowing where it is, the vast cost in tracing a Plane does not make sense, there is Sat systems these days that can pin point most things, these MUST be installed on ALL aircraft and all tracking systems at this time MUST be hidden so NOBODY can just switch them off, this should have been a common sense approach long before this one.

Please make sure that ALL planes and its passengers are as safe as can be and this can never happen again.

AVIATION AUTHORITY get to grips with it please WORLDWIDE.

Many thanks for reading this.
